name: aethr (Proof of Concept)
description:
Little game demo that functioned as a way to learn procedural terrain generation (2D) as well as physics based movement and inverse kinematics. Controls are not displayed in game so check here! There isn't much content as of now.

You play as a planet-hopping feline working as an arms dealer. Scavenge worlds for materials to create new weapons.

Controls:

A/D - Left/right

Space - Jump

Ctrl - Crouch

Right Mouse Button - Grab item/rope, or drop item

Left Mouse Button - Shoot/use robo-arm

F - Toggle robo-arm 

Q/E - Swap robo-arm claw head

Tab - Inventory
